Name of project

Brought to you by

Explore data about your community

Name of project brings together data, tools, and reports on Te Āo Māori. You can access data from reputable sources that is free for you to take and use.

Dig into data on health, wellbeing, Papatūānuku, and more. Read reports on the value of data to Māoridom, Māori data sovereignty, and other topics. And explore tools and other resources made for or by Māori.

Title

Ko te moemoea a Maui kia haere ngatahi ai ratou ko ona tuakana ki te hii ika. I te hokinga mai o ona tuakana ki tatahi, ka kii atu a Maui, “ka taea e au te haramai i to koutou na taha ki te hii ika?” Engari, ko te whakautu o ona tuakana ki a ia ano, “Kao, he rangatahi noa iho koe. Kaore he wahi mau kei te waka nei, na reira me noho tau ki tatahi ke”.

Explore topics and charts

See interactive charts, data sources, definitions, and how and why data was collected. Take and use charts and data for free.

Try out tools

Use interactive data tools to examine issues like the impacts of COVID-19 on different types of jobs.

Read reports and presentations

Get information that supports your use of data and provides a deeper understanding of Te Āo Māori through the lens of data

Find Business Figures

Explore data specific to your industries of work, workforce, and customer base.
